product_name: Salomon XA Comp 7 CS WP Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Salomon XA Comp 7 CS WP women's trail-running shoes are built for nimble pursuits across varying terrain, providing waterproof protection and a supportive fit to ensure comfort along the way. Synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers are water resistant, durable and lightweight; synthetic overlays deliver a secure, supportive fit across insteps. Climashield(TM) waterproof membranes offer breathability and sturdy protection from the elements, helping keep feet dry and comfortable. Quicklace(TM) lacing system takes just a single pull for an exact fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. Protective toe caps resist abrasion to uppers and protect toes and shoes from bumps and abrasion. Nylon linings wick moisture away from your feet to keep them comfortable. Washable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. Midsoles offer responsive, dual-density EVA for excellent neutral cushioning and rebound through your entire stride. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon XA Comp 7 CS WP women's trail-running shoes deliver traction across mixed terrain and sloppy trail conditions. Fit tip: per Salomon, size down 1/2 size.
short_description: The Salomon XA Comp 7 CS WP women's trail-running shoes are built for nimble pursuits across varying terrain, providing waterproof protection and a supportive fit to ensure comfort along the way.
